content: अस्खलित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Unshaken, unyielding, firm, permanent. {@--2@} Unhurt, sound and safe; °भ्रातृशतः <ls>Ve. 5.</ls> {@--3@} Not stumbling or slipping, undeviating, careful; समे चिरायास्खलितोपचारां <ls>R. 5. 20</ls>; °प्रयाण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} with unfaltering steps, not stumbling in gait.
